title: I have always resisted it, but now even I think we need more bans
body:
ekko, gragas, leblanc, sejuani, ryze, hecarim, katarina, rek'sai, kalista, ashe, irelia, vladimir, cho'gath, azir, nautilus, zed, ahri, morgana, fizz, vi.

I see all TWENTY of these champions banned, and yet only a select 6 of these get removed every game. 4 more wouldn't hurt, in fact, it would only make life better.

pretty please?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Totalis,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xPxktrAH,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-11T22:34:21.779+0000)
>
> **ekko**, gragas, **leblanc**, sejuani, ryze, hecarim, **katarina**, rek'sai, kalista, ashe, irelia, vladimir, cho'gath, azir, nautilus, **zed**, ahri, morgana, **fizz**, vi.
> 
> I see all TWENTY of these champions banned, and yet only a select 6 of these get removed every game. 4 more wouldn't hurt, in fact, it would only make life better.
> 
> pretty please?

Uninstall.
I still completely agree with you, you really should uninstall, you can stop telling us that.

What's the problem of banning those champions?

It's not like they aren't problematic anyway.
